title: Top Places to visit in Yemmiganur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Yemmiganur is a town in the Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yemmiganur Mandal of the Adoni revenue division.
 
History
Yemmiganur is one of the major towns in the Kurnool district. It was part of the Vijayanagar from the 14th c
